text:
In the middle of the tutorial comes an `X` variable that has not beed defined before (and stems from the good old nisl :-))
http://nilearn.github.io/decoding/decoding_tutorial.html#decoding-without-a-mask-anova-svm

http://nilearn.github.io/decoding/decoding_tutorial.html#changing-the-feature-selection
In section 2.1.4.2, the `clf` classifier is also undefined.
title: Inconcistencies in the decoding tutorial
